testcase.name: DBA.TM33
testcase.description: DBA.TM33: ReportingPeriodEndDate with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:RegisteredReportingPeriodDeviatingFromReportedReportingPeriodDueArbitraryDatesMember must only be tagged once.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: ReportingPeriodEndDate with the dimension of TypeOfReportingPeriodDimension:RegisteredReportingPeriodDeviatingFromReportedReportingPeriodDueArbitraryDatesMember appears twice
